iops.description: The number of I/O operations per second (IOPS) that the volume supports

type.description: The volume type. Valid options are `gp2`, `io1`, `standard` and `st1`. See [EBS Volume Types](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/EBSVolumeTypes.html).

volumesPerInstance.description: The number of EBS volumes with this configuration to attach to each EC2 instance in the instance group (default is 1)
